most_active_tickets.title: Long Term Memory still slows down my PC, even after updating to LTM-2
Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months
Bug: unable to cancel the download of an LLLM

common_issues.title: Pieces OS users report various bugs and performance issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with Pieces OS, including slow performance with Long Term Memory, inability to cancel LLLM downloads, and problems generating shareable links. Troubleshooting steps vary depending on the specific problem, and some users have reported unsuccessful attempts at resolving these issues.

related_issues.title: Long Term Memory still slows down my PC, even after updating to LTM-2
related_issues.text:
Long Term Memory still slows down my PC, even after updating to LTM-2
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Turning on Long Term Memory has been slowing down my desktop computer, even before LTM-2. After updating today, it still happens. It's most noticeable when I use Slack and Discord, and disabling those apps on LTM doesn't work. Even after switching the Processing Mode to Cloud, as suggested by HRA42 on the Discord server, the lag still occurs. At some point, the total CPU usage went up by over 90%.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/eaef0d65-b19b-41f0-bf8a-f143fa8d1e43)

My computer specs:
- CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-6300 CPU @ 3.80GHz
- RAM: DDR4 32 GB
- Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 2 GB

I'm yet to notice significant slowness on other programs, but if I'm getting a lot of lag on those chat apps, I can imagine I would get them too on something heavier like Visual Studio.

related_issues.title: Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months
related_issues.text:
Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months
### Software

Desktop Application, Web Extension, VS Code, Sharing Web App

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

10.1.12

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I've been unable to generate shareable personal links and utilize the web sharing app since before June '24. I've created an issue about this twice before, and the last time was just completely disregarded and it was closed out.

Here is the screenshot from within my Pieces Desktop when trying to generate a personal link, as well as generate a GitHub Gist:

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0966a1a9-3076-4d9b-9006-88a14673cc9f)
Error generating summary: 400 Project `640481513740` is not allowed to use Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro`

recommendations: Investigate and address the performance issues with Long Term Memory reported by Pieces OS users, particularly the slow down experienced even after updating to LTM-2.
Develop a solution to allow users to cancel LLLM downloads, as the inability to do so is causing frustration.
Prioritize resolving the long-standing issue of users being unable to generate personal shareable links, which has persisted for over 6 months.
Improve communication with users who report issues, ensuring their concerns are addressed and not disregarded, especially for recurring problems like the shareable links bug.
Consider creating more specific categories for bug reports, such as 'Performance Issues' or 'Shareable Links', to better categorize and track similar issues in the future.
